Grow my business
Promote products or services
Generate more sales

Are you currently using email marketing? *
option- 
Yes, already sending emails
Tried before but stopped
Not yet, planning to start

How many emails do you plan to send per day? *
optoin- 
Under 1,000
1,000–5,000
5,000–10,000
10,000+

Biggest challenge you are facing with email (optional) *
option-

Low open rates

Not sure where to start
